pages.title: Stabilizer Charm
pages.text: Reduces passive exhaustion buildup.$(br2)Environmental effects still apply, but are softened.$(br)Ideal for long journeys or high-altitude bases.

pages.title: Essence Converter
pages.text: Converts $(5)Experience Points$() into $(e)Saturation$().$(br2)Drains XP rapidly â€” only sustainable for players above roughly $(6)Level 30$().$(br2)Useful in emergencies, but costly.

pages.title: Metabolic Override
pages.text: Completely prevents exhaustion accumulation.$(br2)You can sprint indefinitely.$(br2)However, natural regeneration is replaced: healing now directly consumes $(e)Saturation$() and $(c)Hunger$().$(br2)No food means no healing.
